step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_FACE (PID) (SELECT P.FACE_PID FROM AD_FACE P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(P.GEOMETRY, [polygon]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG (PID) (SELECT P.REGION_ID FROM AD_ADMIN P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(P.GEOMETRY, [polygon]) = 'TRUE' AND P.REGION_ID!=0 AND P.REGION_ID!=-1);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_LINK (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT T.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_AD_FACE P, AD_FACE_TOPO T WHERE P.PID = T.FACE_PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.S_NODE_PID FROM AD_LINK P, TEMP_AD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID UNION ALL SELECT P.E_NODE_PID FROM AD_LINK P, TEMP_AD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID );

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_ADMIN_GROUP (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT P.GROUP_ID FROM AD_ADMIN_GROUP P,TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG T WHERE P.REGION_ID_UP=T.PID UNION SELECT DISTINCT P.GROUP_ID FROM AD_ADMIN_PART P,TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG T WHERE P.REGION_ID_DOWN=T.PID );
SELECT P.* FROM AD_FACE P,TEMP_AD_FACE T WHERE P.FACE_PID =T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM AD_FACE_TOPO P, TEMP_AD_FACE T WHERE P.FACE_PID = T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM AD_LINK P, TEMP_AD_LINK M WHERE P.LINK_PID = M.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM AD_LINK_MESH P, TEMP_AD_LINK M WHERE P.LINK_PID = M.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM AD_NODE P, TEMP_AD_NODE R WHERE P.NODE_PID = PID;
SELECT P.* FROM AD_NODE_MESH P, TEMP_AD_NODE R WHERE P.NODE_PID = PID;
SELECT P.* FROM AD_ADMIN P,TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG T WHERE P.REGION_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM AD_ADMIN_NAME P,TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG T WHERE P.REGION_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM AD_ADMIN_NAME_TONE P,(SELECT P.NAME_ID FROM AD_ADMIN_NAME P,TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG T WHERE P.REGION_ID=T.PID) T WHERE P.NAME_ID=T.NAME_ID;
SELECT P.* FROM AD_ADMIN_DETAIL P WHERE P.ADMIN_ID IN(SELECT P.ADMIN_ID FROM AD_ADMIN P,TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG T WHERE P.REGION_ID=T.PID );
SELECT P.* FROM AD_ADMIN_GROUP P,TEMP_AD_ADMIN_GROUP T WHERE P.GROUP_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM AD_ADMIN_PART P,TEMP_AD_ADMIN_GROUP T WHERE P.GROUP_ID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM AD_FACE P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_AD_FACE T );
DELETE FROM AD_FACE_TOPO P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_AD_FACE T );
DELETE FROM AD_LINK P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_AD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM AD_LINK_MESH P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_AD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM AD_NODE P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_AD_NODE T );
DELETE FROM AD_NODE_MESH P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_AD_NODE T );
DELETE FROM AD_ADMIN P WHERE P.REGION_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG T );
DELETE FROM AD_ADMIN_NAME P WHERE P.REGION_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG T );
DELETE FROM AD_ADMIN_NAME_TONE P WHERE P.NAME_ID IN (SELECT P.NAME_ID FROM AD_ADMIN_NAME P, TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG T WHERE P.REGION_ID = T.PID);
DELETE FROM AD_ADMIN_DETAIL P WHERE P.ADMIN_ID IN (SELECT ADMIN_ID FROM AD_ADMIN P WHERE P.REGION_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG T ));
DELETE FROM AD_ADMIN_GROUP P WHERE P.GROUP_ID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_AD_ADMIN_GROUP T);
DELETE FROM AD_ADMIN_PART P WHERE P.GROUP_ID IN(SELECT PID FROM TEMP_AD_ADMIN_GROUP T);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_FACE SELECT FACE_PID FROM AD_FACE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM AD_FACE B WHERE A.FACE_PID = B.FACE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_LINK SELECT LINK_PID FROM AD_LINK A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM AD_LINK B WHERE A.LINK_PID = B.LINK_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_NODE SELECT NODE_PID FROM AD_NODE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM AD_NODE B WHERE A.NODE_PID = B.NODE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG SELECT REGION_ID FROM AD_ADMIN A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM AD_ADMIN B WHERE A.REGION_ID = B.REGION_ID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_ADMIN_GROUP SELECT GROUP_ID FROM AD_ADMIN_GROUP A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM AD_ADMIN_GROUP B WHERE A.GROUP_ID = B.GROUP_ID);
